name: Zhingshyenhuo, The Sage
text:
Zhingshyenhuo, The Sage can’t be countered. 
When Zhingshyenhuo enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, put two Chi counters on Zhingshyenhuo.
{1}, Remove all Chi counters from Zhingshyenhuo: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value equal or less than the number of counters removed this way. You may choose new targets for the copy.
